frontmatter.title: Meshery accepted into the CNCF Landscape
frontmatter.subtitle: A story about growing together as a community and building a project that matters
frontmatter.author: The Newsroom
frontmatter.description: Meshery, the service mesh management project, is now officially part of the Cloud Native Computing Foundation's Landscape. Explore our community's journey and growth in contributing to the cloud-native ecosystem.
